data.name: plTitle.Help
data.value: Enter a Title for the Announcment. Depending on the Skin, this title will appear in bold.

data.name: plDescription.Help
data.value: Enter a description of the Announcement

data.name: plURL.Help
data.value: The Announcment can optionally link to an external URL, a Page within this site or to a File within this site.

data.name: plPublishDate.Help
data.value: Enter an Publish Date for the Announcement. The Announcement will only display from this date.

data.name: Title.ErrorMessage
data.value: You Must Enter A Title For The Announcement

data.name: Description.ErrorMessage
data.value: You Must Enter A Description Of The Announcement

data.name: plViewOrder.Help
data.value: Enter the View Order for the Announcement.

data.name: ViewOrder.ErrorMessage
data.value: View order must be an integer value.

data.name: ModuleHelp.Text
data.value:
About the Announcements Module

The Announcements Module produces a list of simple text announcements consisting of a title and brief description. Options include a read more link to a file, page or other site. Link click tracking and logging are also available. Announcements are ordered from newest to oldest, unless a view order is specified.

Add an Announcement

  1. Add an Announcements module, or go to an existing Announcements module.
  2. Click Add New Announcement.
  3. At Title, enter a title for the announcement.
  4. at Image, select an image to be displayed with this announcement (optional)
  5. At Description, enter a description of the Announcement.
  6. At Link Type (optional), select URL, Page, File or User and then at Link select or enter the required link, page, file or user
  7. At Track Number Of Times This Link Is Clicked? (optional), check the box if required.
  8. At Log The User, Date, And Time For Every Link Click (optional), check the box if required.
  9. At View Order (optional), enter the View Order for the Announcement.
  10. Click Update.

data.name: plImage.Help
data.value: Select and Image for the Announcement.
